subject: Eclipse/JUnit plugin tests/Run or Debug mode?
msgSnippet: Hello, folks: I have a question for anyone who does or has done plug-in development for Eclipse. I have noticed that when I run my plug-in tests in Run mode, I
messageBody:
Hello, folks:

I have a question for anyone who does or has done plug-in development
for Eclipse.

I have noticed that when I run my plug-in tests in Run mode, I get a JVM
crash. I think it's the spawned process for the test workbench. When I
run the plug-in tests in Debug mode, all is well.

Am I doing something wrong, or am I /supposed/ always to run my plug-in
tests in Debug mode?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
